plot: Lukas Reyes is trapped in a seemingly endless loop between parallel existences, one being occupied by his spouse, Sera, and another being occupied by a relation from another life, Nara. As worlds seem to begin colliding and further bleeding into one another, he finds himself pursued by a group of shadow-men known as &"The Knowers&". The common thread between everything being a significance with the time 11:45 - fifteen minutes until midnight.   Written by  official source
title: 15 Till Midnight
